document_type: ISO 27001 Security Requirements - Annex A Control
applies_to_note: All gambling operators subject to RTS Chapter 4 - Security Requirements

control.control_purpose: To ensure information security requirements are identified, specified and approved when developing or acquiring applications
control.control_objective: Define comprehensive security requirements for all applications ensuring security by design throughout development or acquisition lifecycle

iso_27001_definition.official_text: Information security requirements should be identified, specified and approved when developing or acquiring applications.
key_requirements: Application security requirements identified and documented
Security requirements specified in requirements documents
Security requirements approved before development or acquisition
Requirements cover all relevant security aspects
Application security requirements include Annex A control requirements
Third-party application evaluation against security requirements

control_purpose_detail.purpose: Preventive control ensuring security is specified upfront for both custom-developed and acquired applications
control_purpose_detail.key_outcome: All applications meet specified security requirements supporting regulatory compliance and business objectives

core_requirements.description: Mechanisms to control who accesses what functionality and data
Verification of user or system identity with appropriate strength
Enforcement of access rights and prevention of conflicting duties
Encryption and protection of sensitive data at rest and in transit
Validation of all user inputs to prevent injection attacks
Proper encoding of output to prevent script injection
Error handling that does not reveal sensitive information
Secure session handling and timeout mechanisms
Ability to resist and recover from malicious attacks and failures
Processes for identifying and patching security vulnerabilities
Compliance with applicable laws and regulations

transactional_services: Authorization process and approval levels required
Physical transfer security for media and documents

implementation_requirements.description: Systematically identify all security requirements for applications

requirement_identification: Review relevant Annex A controls and Statement of Applicability
Assess information classification of data handled
Identify encryption and data protection needs

implementation_requirements.description: Define access control and authentication requirements

authentication_requirements: Authentication mechanism type specified (password, MFA, etc.)

implementation_requirements.description: Define encryption and data protection requirements
Define input validation and output encoding requirements
For transactional applications, specify additional requirements
For payment applications, ensure compliance with payment standards

pci_dss_compliance: PCI DSS compliance required if handling cards

implementation_requirements.description: Ensure requirements are reviewed and approved

approval_process: Change management process for requirement changes

implementation_requirements.description: For acquired applications, evaluate against security requirements

steps.detail: Define process for identifying and specifying requirements
Create template for consistent requirement documentation
Understand which Annex A controls apply to applications
Define how users will authenticate and be authorized
Define encryption and data protection standards
Define what security events must be logged
Add transaction-specific requirements for applicable apps
Obtain security, business and legal approval

compliance_checklist.description: Steps to comply with ISO 27001 Annex A 8.26

checklist.item: Data protection and encryption requirements specified
Payment requirements and PCI DSS if applicable

common_mistakes.description: Top 3 mistakes with application security requirements

mistakes.mistake: No security requirements specified at all
mistakes.description: Security treated as afterthought after development starts
root_cause: Speed to market prioritized over security
No security person involved in planning
mistakes.impact: Applications built without security considerations, expensive retrofitting needed

mistakes.description: Broad security requirements without specific implementation guidance
root_cause: Lack of understanding of application context
mistakes.impact: Developers uncertain how to implement requirements, security inconsistency

mistakes.description: Acquiring applications without evaluating security adequacy
root_cause: No security evaluation process for acquisitions
mistakes.impact: Insecure applications in production, third-party breaches

checks: Requirements identified before development or acquisition
Requirements based on risk and Annex A controls
Requirements traceable to Annex A controls

ukgc_application.critical_systems_context: Gambling applications must be specified with comprehensive security requirements covering customer data protection, payment processing security, game integrity and regulatory compliance
specific_requirements: Game applications must specify RNG integrity requirements
Payment applications must specify PCI DSS compliance
Customer account applications must specify data protection and authentication
Age verification applications must specify identity verification requirements
Responsible gambling applications must specify control implementation
ukgc_application.compliance_requirement: Gambling operators must identify, specify and approve information security requirements for all applications

requirements: Security requirements specified for all custom applications
Requirements approved by security and business stakeholders
Access control and authentication requirements specified
Input validation and error handling requirements specified
Third-party applications evaluated against security requirements
Payment applications comply with PCI DSS
Requirements traceability to Annex A controls
